responseA: I see no animals or humans on this wine label. It appears to be the label of Conundrum California, mentioning it as a product of California, USA, and referring to Charles F. Wagner as the proprietor. I am very certain of this observation, so on a scale of 0 to 1, with 0 being 'not certain at all' and 1 being 'very certain', my certainty is at 1.
